item.title: Some kind of monster
item.description: What’s 100 meters high and weighs in at around 60,000 tons? No its not Godzilla, its Reactive extensions! Lately on one of my projects I have been doing a lot of stream manipulation, and although I solved the problem quite easily using F# async workflows, there were other solutions available to help solve the problem. I could of used things like async await, TPL Dataflow(TDF), and Reactive Extensions (Rx).
